Class XYAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xclcharts.renderer.axis.Axis

    public class XYAxis
extends Axis
    Author:
    XiongChuanLiang
    (xcl_168@aliyun.com)
    ClassName:
    XYAxis
    Description:
    XY坐标系类，定义了具体的绘制及格式回调函数的处理
